title: On plots having non-buildable/POS reservation/existing amenity and having area more than 4,000 sq
clause_text: On plots having non-buildable/POS reservation/existing amenity and having area more than 4,000 sq. m, 2 toilets and 2 urinals each for ladies and gents and preferably one toilet for differently abled persons and one urinal for children shall be constructed.
